title: 186 - The Best Excuse Off Work Ever?
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with all the boys in studio as our Canadian Pal has grabbed the reigns. The boys all discuss their eventful weekend, as Gump, Bruce, and Connor gave their reviews of the new James Bond and overall theater experience. Then we jump right into the Pod FOD which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Today’s FOD starts off diving into Canadian Pal’s fridge and boy he takes minimalist to a new level. The folder is mainly dominated by movie and show teasers including “Dune part 2”, “Succesion” season 5, and “The Last Kingdom”. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
